message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more but you still get a good share.
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
This is a fair deal, Alice.  Let's settle this before inflation eats away any more profit.
Come on Bob, you're losing value every round. This is a good deal for you.
Alice, let's be realistic. This is the best offer you'll get with the inflation working against me. Take the deal!
You're running out of time, Bob. Inflation is killing your share. Take this deal before it's too late.
